name: The Right Perspective (MatthewRader)
description:
The Right Perspective is a small puzzle game created at a game jam hosted by the University of Michigan's game development club, Wolverine Soft.

Credits

  • Matthew Rader (Music, Art, Design)
  • Jacob Smellie (Programming, Puzzle Design)
  • Derek Ge (Puzzle Design)
  • Rob Swor (Programming, Modeling)

Assets Used

  • CasualGameSounds - Dustyroom (Sound Effects)
  • Cylinder Nine - Chris Zabriskie (Main Menu Music)
